Test Steps:

1. Install the newest nodejs first, now it's version 0.12.7
2. Test basic log function:
    node test_log.js
3. Test Intrinsic and ElQuintet car data type process:
    node test_cardatatype.js
4. Test out Interface:
    node test_elastosroot.js
5. Test callback function
    node test_callback.js

--------end--------
